list.description: These are some useful tools for performing various tasks

items.title: Flash Cards
items.description: A tool that can be used to help memorize things. Record question - answer pairs

items.title: Soundz
items.description: A toy for generating sounds with an Oscillator in your browser. Open several windows and jam out.

items.title: SVG Test
items.description: This can be used to test making SVG images, it lets you view the SVG image you're working on on the right of the page.

items.title: Random From List
items.description: Chooses one item from a list specified

items.title: Random Remove
items.description: Removes a random item from a list until there are none left

items.title: List Randomizer
items.description: Shuffles a list of items in a random fashion
